meanings.sent1: The open field was unwalled, with no barriers around it.
meanings.sent2: The house had an unwalled backyard, perfect for playing freely.
meanings.sent3: The unwalled garden felt like a wild jungle waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent4: Her unwalled emotions spilled out freely, unrestrained by any barriers.
meanings.sent5: The unwalled sky stretched endlessly above, a vast expanse of freedom.

meanings.sent1: The unwalled room felt spacious and airy.
meanings.sent2: The unwalled city had a unique charm, unlike any other.
meanings.sent3: The unwalled fortress was a puzzling sight, lacking the expected defenses.
meanings.sent4: His unwalled mind was open to endless possibilities and new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The unwalled horizon beckoned, promising a world without boundaries.
